title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
description: When adding a table report item without setting the data set, try creating a new table group. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
OB: It is not stated in the bug report what happens when trying to create a new table group without setting the data set.
EB: The group dialog should be shown, allowing the user to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item to the project without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. Observe that the group dialog is shown and the user can define a group, even without a dataset.
